item.title: V1.0.0.0 & Roadmap
item.description: New and planned Version 1.0.0.0 Automatic attachment of reminded invoices to reminder on sending of reminder Control of sending by reminder level Control of sending by reminder method Planned functions for future versions Automatic attachment of delivery bills
